title: HELP!!
body: Hey guys! So as you know we can change our NA Server league of legends language into other languages such as Korean, Spanish, Chinese, etc. Everyone says for Chinese you have to type zh_CN in the riot locale folder but that doesn't work. Anyone know why this doesn't work?

replies.body:
I don't think you can run Chinese on the Riot version of the client since none of the *Riot-operated* regions offer Chinese. Additionally, I am unable to assist you in modifying the game files to change the language to one that isn't supported in your region. :(

Let me know if you have any questions.
